PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-15912004-12-16,  LAB,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisRe-appointment of GLEN D. WILSON of Calgary, Alberta, to be a part-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years; and order that GLEN D. WILSON be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act.
